CONTENT.SUBTITLE: It's not just a T-shirt
CONTENT.TITLE: It's a Manifesto to be Worn!
CONTENT.DESCRIPTION: Compound is a statement to wear, it's ink; it's an act of verbal responsibility; it's the indelible polysemy of the character we have imprinted and carry with us.
